why_choose.title: Your Peace of Mind is Our Priority
why_choose.subtitle: We know this day doesn't repeat. That's why we handle the technique so you can focus on feeling.

service.desc: Forget stiff poses. We seek uncontrollable laughter, the furtive tear, and the beauty of authenticity.

local.desc: We know Luxembourg's light and secret corners. Let us guide you to the perfect backdrops for your story.

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.subtitle: Our greatest satisfaction is seeing the happiness of our clients reliving their most precious moments.

1.text: Incredible experience! They captured every emotion of our special day. The photos are works of art we will treasure forever. The attention to detail was exquisite.
1.author: Sophie & Marc

2.text: A truly professional team. They made us feel very comfortable in front of the camera and the final result exceeded all our expectations. Highly recommended.
2.author: Elena & Thomas

3.text: The creativity and passion they put into their work is evident. The photos have magical light and composition. We are in love with our album!
3.author: Isabella & Lucas

intro.p1: You are embarking on a journey that should be defined by joy, not anxiety. In Luxembourg's dynamic event landscape, the difference between a chaotic gathering and a transcendent experience lies not in the budget, but in the precision of the planning.
intro.p2: At WE, we believe that peace of mind is the ultimate luxury. This protocol is distilled from over a decade of experience, designed to give you the foresight of a professional. Read it, use it, and reclaim your calm.

foundation.title: 12-18 Months Out: The Foundation
foundation.desc: In Luxembourg, premium locations (chateaux, Moselle estates) are booked well in advance. Do not secure dates before securing the space.

guests.title: The Guest List
guests.desc: Define your numbers now. A "Sage" knows that 150 guests require a different logistical beast than 80.

triad.title: The Vendor Priority Triad
triad.insight: "Who" matters more than "How Much". A vendor who knows the venue's restrictions is worth their weight in gold.

rain.title: The Rain Plan
rain.desc: Luxembourg Reality: Never assume sun. We design for rain so that if it happens, it feels intentional (e.g., clear marquees, cozy indoor lighting).

gap.title: Kirchberg-Moselle Gap
gap.desc: If your ceremony is in the city and reception in the country, provide shuttles. It allows guests to indulge and ensures everyone arrives on your timeline.

diet.title: Dietary Dignity
diet.desc: Vegetarian/Vegan options should be as visually stunning as the main menu. A guest treated with care is a guest who raves about your event.

coord.desc: Buying a coordinator is buying your own presence. Be a guest at your own event.

light.desc: Lighting transforms a room more effectively than flowers, for half the cost.

favors.desc: Guests forget "stuff". They remember how they felt (Music, Food, Flow).

cta.title: Start Your Journey Well
cta.text: This protocol is the map. But a map is not a guide. To execute a vision of this magnitude requires a partner who watches the horizon while you enjoy the view.

about.title: The Calm Behind the Scenes
about.p1: We know that organizing a high-level event isn't just logistics; it's managing expectations, dreams, and sometimes, a lot of pressure.
about.p2: At Welux Events, our mission is simple: on your event day, you should be just another guest. We are the guardians of your peace of mind, the invisible ones who make the magic seem natural.

values.title: Our Philosophy (Unfiltered)
values.subtitle: What actually matters to us when the cameras are off.

passion.title: We Actually Care
passion.desc: We cry at ceremonies (yes, still). We live your day with you, not just record it.

excellence.title: No Surprises
excellence.desc: We love improvisation on the dance floor, not in logistics. We plan so you can relax.

creativity.title: Your Wedding, Not Pinterest
creativity.desc: We seek to capture who YOU are, not copy the trendy wedding from two months ago.

connection.title: Humans, Not Vendors
connection.desc: We want you to feel as comfortable with us as you do with your guests.

team.title: The Team Behind the Cameras
team.subtitle: Professionals, yes. But above all, people who love to celebrate.

legal.title: Privacy Policy & Legal Notice
legal.controller_text: Welux Events is the controller of your personal data. We are committed to protecting your privacy in accordance with the GDPR.
legal.data_text: We collect information you provide directly to us via our contact forms (Name, Email, Phone, Event Details) for the sole purpose of responding to your inquiry and providing our services.
legal.purpose_text: Your data is used to manage bookings, communicate regarding your event, and issue invoices. We do not sell your data to third parties.
legal.rights_text: You have the right to access, rectify, or request deletion of your data at any time by contacting us at bookings@weluxevents.com.
legal.image_rights_text: Welux Events acts exclusively as a technical service provider for image capture. The Client is solely responsible for informing their guests and obtaining the necessary consent for image capture and dissemination, in accordance with applicable laws in Luxembourg. The Client explicitly releases Welux Events from any liability or third-party claims related to image rights.
legal.disclaimer: This website is provided for informational purposes. While we strive for accuracy, we cannot guarantee the completeness of the information.

associated_services.title: Digital Services
associated_services.subtitle: Your Partner That Never Sleeps. Multiply Your Sales Power x3.
associated_services.intro: It's not just a website, it's your own digital empire. Imagine a system working 24/7 for you.

section_family.title: ü§ù The Personal Touch
section_family.p1: Let's talk business, family to family.
section_family.p2: building a business is hard work. Small business owners often end up being slaves to their phones, answering messages late at night instead of resting.
section_family.p3: Stop missing out on life because you have to answer "How much is this?" a hundred times a day. We have a solution.

section_space.title: üåê Your Own Digital Space
section_space.p1: Imagine having a premium digital showroom that belongs to YOU. Not a rented social media page, but a high-end platform.
section_space.p2: It's not just for show; it's a sales engine. Open your doors to the world, not just your neighborhood.
section_space.highlight: We are talking about multiplying your sales power by 3!

section_auto.title: ü§ñ Smart Automation
section_auto.intro: The best part? While you focus on your craft or enjoy a coffee, technology is working for you.

list.1: Forget the phone: The bot answers, gives prices, and closes deals.
list.2: Automatic Sales: Clients browse, choose, and buy instantly.
list.3: Perfect Organization: Everything is recorded and organized automatically.

section_why.title: üëî Why Welux?
section_why.text: Because we don't build "cold" websites. We build systems with elegance but with the efficiency you need to grow. Move from being the employee of your business to being the Owner.

agents_section.subtitle: Help other businesses grow and earn commissions.
agents_section.desc: We are looking for visionaries. If you know businesses that need this, join us.

cookies.message: We use cookies to improve your experience. By accepting, you help us analyze traffic and personalize content.

faq.q1: How much does a wedding photographer cost in Luxembourg?
faq.a1: Prices vary depending on the selected package. At Welux Events we offer packages from basic photography to full coverage with video and streaming. Contact us for a personalized quote.
faq.q2: Do you offer live video services (streaming)?
faq.a2: Yes, we offer professional live streaming services for weddings and corporate events, allowing family and friends who cannot attend to participate in real time.
faq.q3: What languages do you offer service in?
faq.a3: We are a multicultural team. We speak Luxembourgish, English, French, German, Spanish, and Portuguese.

image_rights.title: Image Rights & Responsibility
image_rights.seo_desc: Policy regarding image usage, photography rights, and media responsibility at Welux Events.

photo_policy.title: Photography Usage Policy
photo_policy.desc: At Welux Events, we take great pride in capturing the magic of your special moments. All images displayed on this website are either:

list.1: Captured by our official team of photographers during events managed by Welux Events.
list.2: Licensed stock photography used for illustrative purposes.
list.3: Provided by clients or partners with explicit permission for use.

privacy.title: Privacy & GDPR Compliance
privacy.desc_1: We respect the privacy of all individuals. In accordance with GDPR and Luxembourg data protection laws, any individual depicted in a photograph on our website has the right to request its removal if they have not provided consent or if they believe their privacy is being infringed upon.
privacy.removal_text: To request the removal of an image, please contact us at
